short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help users use Station "bilibili.com" more healthily, refuse to indulge and use it benign

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help users use Bilibili in a healthier way to avoid being addicted to video content; use Bilibili in a positive way, do not watch videos excessively, and have a moderate rhythm; arrange rest time reasonably to ensure physical and mental health; participate in indoor and outdoor fitness and entertainment activities to ensure physical health.

Core functions:

- Weekly usage time report
- Set daily usage limit
- Cross-device data synchronization

帮助用户更加健康地使用B站，以免沉迷于视频内容；在B站上良性使用，不要过度观看视频，要有适度的节奏；合理安排休息时间，确保身心健康；多参与室内及室外的健身和娱乐活动，保证身体健康。

核心功能：

- 每周使用时长报表
- 设置每日限额使用
- 跨设备数据同步
